text: 15-Chakrata Legislative Assembly constituency is one of the seventy electoral Uttarakhand Legislative Assembly constituencies of Uttarakhand state in India. It includes Chakrata area of Dehradun District. This seat is previously known as Chakrata Constituency before 2002 Delimitation Chakrata Legislative Assembly constituency is a part of Tehri Garhwal (Lok Sabha constituency). ==Members of Legislative Assembly== Keys: {| class="wikitable" |- !colspan="2"|Election!!Member!!Party |- |style="background-color: " | | 1974 | Gulab Singh | Indian National Congress |- |style="background-color: " | | 1977 | Shoorveer Singh | Janata Party |- |style="background-color: " | | 1980 | Gulab Singh | Indian National Congress |- |style="background-color: " | | 1985 | Gulab Singh | Indian National Congress |- |style="background-color: " | | 1989 | Gulab Singh | Indian National Congress |- |style="background-color: " | | 1991 | Munna Singh Chauhan | Janata Dal |- |style="background-color: " | | 1993 | Pritam Singh | Indian National Congress |- |style="background-color: " | | 1996 | Munna Singh Chauhan | Samajwadi Party |- | colspan=4 align=center|Major boundary changes |- |style="background-color: " | | 2002 | Pritam Singh | Indian National Congress |- |style="background-color: " | | 2007 | Pritam Singh | Indian National Congress |- |style="background-color: " | | 2012 | Pritam Singh | Indian National Congress |- |style="background- color: " | | 2017 | Pritam Singh | Indian National Congress |} ==See also== * Tehri Garhwal (Lok Sabha constituency) ==References== * http://eci.nic.in/eci_main/CurrentElections/CONSOLIDATED_ORDER%20_ECI%20.pdf * http://ceo.uk.gov.in/files/Election2012/RESULTS_2012_Uttarakhand_State.pdf * http://www.elections.in/uttarakhand/assembly-constituencies/chakrata.html Category:Politics of Dehradun Category:Assembly constituencies of Uttarakhand Category:2002 establishments in India Category:Constituencies established in 2002
